name: Tasty SHMUP
description:
I didnt finish the game as i ran out of time, but here's my submission which is continually being worked on until complete :)

Swap between Light and Dark form to defeat the dark and light enemies, while also taking out the towers... 

 WASD / Arrow Keys - Move player

Space Key - Swap between Light and Dark element.

Shift Key - Bomb all bullets and enemies on screen. (Uses Energy from the bar at the top)
